author: Joaquín Simó
description: A great aperitif drink which uses bready genever and gentian liqueur as its backbone with spoons of herbal Galliano, genepi and chocolate liqueurs adding interest and complexity.
name: Simon Says
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
5 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
